---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an idea that improves Myriad Green V3
labels: enhancement
---

## Summary
Describe the feature or improvement.

## Problem / Opportunity
What challenge does this solve? Why is it important?

## Proposed solution
Outline the approach, including any new sections, components, or integrations.

## Alternatives considered
List alternative solutions or explain why none were viable.

## Additional context
Wireframes, references, or notes that help clarify the request.
